meanings.definition: The quality or state of being glaring.
meanings.sent1: The glaringness of the sun hurt my eyes.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit's glaringness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The glaringness of the neon sign made it impossible to miss.
meanings.sent4: The glaringness of his mistake was evident to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The glaringness of the warning signs made me cautious.

meanings.sent1: His glaringness at the teacher showed his frustration.
meanings.sent2: The glaringness of the cat made me back away slowly.
meanings.sent3: The glaringness of the toddler made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her glaringness at the mirror reflected her dissatisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The glaringness of the boss made everyone nervous.
